{"id":411376391,"lang":"python3","time":"8 months, 1 week","timestamp":1603264594,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"32 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/411376391/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"14.1 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    \n    def myPow(self, x: float, n: int) -> float:\n        # O(logn) time | O(1) space\n        def power(a, p):\n            if p == 0:\n                return 1\n            res = 1\n            while p > 0:\n                if p % 2 == 1:\n                    res *= a\n                    p -= 1\n                a *= a\n                p = p // 2\n            return res\n\n        ans = power(x, abs(n))\n        return ans if n >= 0 else 1/ans\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n"}
